summary: This bill, "Improving Atmospheric River Forecasts Act," mandates the Under Secretary to establish a program focused on improving forecasts and warnings for atmospheric rivers. The program will involve collaborations with weather enterprises and educational institutions to reduce life, property, and economic losses. It emphasizes improving forecast accuracy, incorporating new observational data, developing improved modeling, and enhancing hazard communication.  It requires air reconnaissance, data management strategies, and a plan with timelines to achieve the program's goals.
